View Main Window Module

class proteus.view.main_window.MainWindow(project_path=None, project_title=None, clean=False)

Main window class.

add_object(obj) → None

Adds a child to the selected object.

Parameters:

obj – The object to be cloned and inserted.

closeEvent(event)

Detects the close window event and shows a warning message box, if the project is not saved.

create_dock_windows() → None

Creates dock windows.

create_document_inspector() → None

Creates document inspector tree.

create_visualizer_widget() → None

Creates and loads visualizers.

load_ribbon() → Ribbon

Loads ribbon menu.

Returns:

ribbon widget.

preferences() → None

Opens the preferences dialog.
